titleStmt.title: An Act of the Commons of England in Parliament assembled, for the relief, and imployment of the poor, and the punishing of vagrants and other disorderly persons, within the City of London and liberties thereof Whereby is constituted a corporation, or body politick, consisting of a president, deputy, treasurer, and assistants for the due ordering and putting in execution the said Act.
Public General Acts. 1649-05-07
titleStmt.author: England and Wales.

titleStmt.title: An Act of the Commons of England in Parliament assembled, for the relief, and imployment of the poor, and the punishing of vagrants and other disorderly persons, within the City of London and liberties thereof Whereby is constituted a corporation, or body politick, consisting of a president, deputy, treasurer, and assistants for the due ordering and putting in execution the said Act.
Public General Acts. 1649-05-07
titleStmt.author: England and Wales.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Richard Cotes printer to the honourable city of London,
